headline: Barclays Highlights Realty Income’s (O) Evolving Net-Lease Platform
summary: Realty Income Corporation (NYSE:O) is included among the 15 Blue Chip Dividend Stocks to Build a Passive Income Porfolio. On December 3, Barclays boosted its price target on Realty Income Corporation (NYSE:O) to $64 from $63 while keeping an Equal Weight rating. headline: Realty Income (O): Assessing Valuation After a Steady Year of Share Price Gains
summary: Realty Income (O) has quietly delivered steady gains this year, and with shares drifting higher again this month, many income-focused investors are asking whether the current price still offers a reasonable entry point. See our latest analysis for Realty Income. With the share price now at $58.48 and a solid year to date share price return of around 11 percent, recent gains have gently reversed earlier weakness. This hints that momentum is rebuilding even as long term total shareholder...
